member.name: T:Lutron.DocumentsApi.Controllers.DocumentsController
member.summary: Description : Version 1.0 of Controller for Documents. Serves request of type - "/api/documents"

member.name: M:Lutron.DocumentsApi.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocumentsByProductFamily(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get a list of documents available in Ecosystem, for a requested Product Family and Country. The Product Family name to be supplied should be the internal name of Product Family, which is language independent.
member.param: [required] Country Code - ISO 3166 Alpha-2 code for country
[required] Product Family Name. This should be the internal name of Product Family which is language independent.
member.returns: List of Documents for a given Product Family and Country in data property of API response
member.response: List of Documents for a given Product Family and Country in data property of API response

member.name: M:Lutron.DocumentsApi.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocumentsByPFDocumentType(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get a list of documents available in Ecosystem, for a requested Product Family, Country and document-type. The Product Family name and document-type to be supplied should be the internal name of Product Family and document-type respectively, which are language independent.
member.param: [required] Country Code - ISO 3166 Alpha-2 code for country
[required] Product Family Name. This should be the internal name of Product Family which is language independent.
[required] Document Type. This should be the internal name of Document Type which is language independent.
member.returns: List of Documents for a given Product Family, Country and Document Type in data property of API response.
member.response: List of documents for a given Product Family, Country and Document Type in data property of API response

[required] Solution Name. This should be the internal name of Solution which is language independent.
member.returns: List of Documents for a given Solution and Country in data property of API response
member.response: List of Documents for given Solution and Country in data property of API response

member.response: List of Documents for given Solution, document type and Country in data property of API response
